titles.title: Strategic Nuclear Infrastructure Act
Strategic Nuclear Infrastructure Act
To establish a working group to provide input on the feasibility of establishing a program to support strategically important capital-intensive infrastructure projects.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

bill.summary:
Strategic Nuclear Infrastructure Act
This bill establishes a Strategic Infrastructure Fund Working Group to provide input to the National Security Council and other appropriate federal agencies on the feasibility of establishing a Strategic Infrastructure Fund that may be used to support capital-intensive infrastructure projects related to civil nuclear technologies, microprocessors, and other strategic investments.
